reviews.reviewTitle: Works as expected - Keeps me Hydrated
reviews.reviewText:
So I wasn't sure I needed this, "who needs a water bottle to remind me when I'm thirsty?" But turns out I was completely wrong and I actually really love this water bottle! I really find the light up system helpful especially on busy days at work when I might forget to go grab that cup of water.

This 3-in-1 speaker really shocked me at how well it works! For it to be so small, the sound is both crispy and deep, very loud. You can have the colored lights dance to the music as well which I thought was a really cool. It goes with me on my bike, in my backpack, with me around the house...

All in all a great health accessory and a heck of a conversation starter.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best Value Smart Water Bottle - Terrible Customer Service
reviews.reviewText:
AMENDED REVIEW:
I'm really dissapointed with the customer service. I originally LOVED this water bottle (see original review below), but after a couple of months the charger broke, basically making it useless. When I reached out to them, they quickly informed me they'd send a new one, but never did. Unless you plan on purchases this several times, I'd say buy a more reliable one.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:
So I have had like 20 smart water bottles, and this is BY far my favorite, even before factoring in the great price. I used to have the Hidrate Spark and hated how you had to order replacement batteries from the company. While this one doesn't track your water intake, I absolutely love the light show I get every 2 hours to remind me to drink. I wish it was every single hour, but it does its job. Not only that, but the speaker volume is so loud when using it that way - it's amazing. Most other water bottles are 16 or 18 ounces, I love that this one is 22. Little things like the size of it, drinking spout, ability to recharge via USB, and closure all make a huge difference, as silly as that sounds. This is seriously my favorite water bottle ever!

¬†I like this product. It tells you when to hydrate without being overtly annoying like others. It works by have the bottom turned on and the light goes up through the water and changes colors. I mention water as if it‚Äôs other than clear, the light doesn‚Äôt show up well. Its also great by being able to turn it off. For this price, that's amazing. I couldn't find any that did that. Charged through USB, so you'll never need batteries. I don't use it for the speakers to pay music so I just turn that feature off from disconnecting my phone.

This water bottle is fabulous! It shipped quick, arrived on time and was easy to set up and connect to blue tooth. I am amazed at how great the sound is when playing music! My son also thought it was COOL! The best part??? It is SUPER affordable! Thank you! Big win!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great way to track your water consumption while listening to music!
reviews.reviewText:
I had been meaning to buy a smart bottle for a while, but I always put it off because of the price point. I found the ICEWATER bottle on Amazon, and decided to give it a try. At 20 dollars a piece, it is very reasonably priced, which I love. First up, the aesthetics. I think they have an okay mix of colors, I mean you cannot go wrong with black and blue, can you? I like that the shape encourages a steady grip on the bottle. Plus, non-toxic and BPA-free material that is made in the USA (I always feel slightly on the edge when I see plastics coming in from the offshore industries)! My primary goal was to somehow make my husband consciously drink more water. So, the Icewater was plopped on to his work desk, and i reminded him to check it every so often. The bottles pairs well with most devices (we tried on an iPhone and two old Android devices too). After it pairs, use it like you would a speaker. THAT is what got me astounded! The speaker quality is spectacular for a bottle. Pretty decent bass too. Of course, this is nowhere near BOSE, but hey, you purchased a smart bottle remember? The bottle holds about 22 oz of water, which is decent. And that lambent glow every once a while works wonders i ensuring that my husband drinks sufficient water throughout the day. On a minus side, no adapter is provided, so we used the USB ports on our laptops to charge our (individual) bottles. I am not sure if the speakers are designed for the dishwasher, but I will say don't try. Wash it with your hands if it comes to it. In my opinion, this is a fantastic bottle for all the basic smart bottle needs.
UPDATE: I originally purchased one for my husband, but thought about it once more, and purchased one for myself too. I mean, I like the idea of drinking out of a bottle that plays fab songs. :D

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality, but a bit "smarter" would be great
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost, this is a solid product. It does what it claims to do, and it doesn't look cheap or tacky. Where I was a little disappointed was in the fact that it isn't app-enabled. this is largely my bad for not reading the product description fully, but I assumed a "smart" water bottle would include some kind of smart tech element. It's great that the water bottle glows every hour, but the purpose is defeated if the water bottle isn't near you when it glows. It would be much better if it included push notifications so you're reminded to go and fetch your water bottle when it's time to drink. It's also lacking the "how much to drink" element. Some kind of measurement feature would be nice, or even a section in the guide outlining how much you should drink when the water bottle glows.

reviews.reviewTitle: Must Buy! Great gifts as well!
reviews.reviewText:
¬†Also shared on my facebook page, I don‚Äôt write many reviews, although I probably should as much as I use Amazon. But, Charged fast and have just been playing today . I‚Äôll start early tomorrow on tracking it more so. I Love how the bottom twists off so can clean bottle. The lights and built in speakers (Bluetooth) you‚Äôre choice to use or not required. For this price I surely didn‚Äôt expect what I received. Which was super fast. Yes,I am a Prime Member although, I must say some sellers even on prime don‚Äôt get product to you in the fast as this was. I need to go ahead and order some Christmas gifts üéÅ.
I‚Äôll definitely be watching other items from this seller!
* I paid for this product in full so this is my unbiased review on this 3-in-1 Smart Water Bottle*

Very disappointed. Was so happy to receive this. I have started a diet and needed motivation to drink more water. Loved the look and idea of this bottle. I received it on January 9th and was happy until yesterday. Now the speaker and color features will not work. It will not turn off or play sound. I really liked it and it was helpful getting me to my daily goal of drinking more water. Will be returning now because with out the added features it is useless to me now. Contacted seller. Will be receiving a replacement bottle. Fingers crossed this one will work better

I got this water bottle to remind me to drink water throughout the day. I can go days and days without drinking water and only drinking sweet tea, flavored waters and juice (oops!) and I am trying hard to change that. The bottle works as described, although I don't always see the reminder light because there is no vibration or sound that accompanies it. Having said that, I have found that I don't really need the reminder light, because I like the way this bottle is set up, it makes it easier to keep on top of drinking water. I like the wide mouth feature, as I always put big lemon slices in my water, and the sport top is great so that you don't spill water on yourself (which is why I hated my last wide-mouth water bottle). The cap also features a little metal clip that can be clipped to the unlatch button, so that the bottle doesn't accidentally become unlatched in your backpack/purse. My two year old is thrilled with this water bottle and steals it from me every chance he gets, because the lights are fun and he loves to listen to music with it. The speaker was also a pleasant surprise, as it packs a punch for such a small speaker. It has nice bass and doesn't sound 'tinny' like most small/cheaper speakers. Overall, this bottle is great and I've taken it with me everywhere since receiving it!

Edited to update rating. Seriously, buy this for the speaker alone. It's absurdly good sound for $20 and has a range of well over 30 feet (through a kitchen, a bathroom, a power conduit and two walls, it still played flawlessly. I can't speak to it's longevity, but even if this thing craps out I'll be getting another one.

Surprisingly good sound quality for $20. I use it in my house just to listen to music now when not on my headphones.

I bought it to use on my bike during my commute (it's incredibly dangerous to use headphones while running/biking where I live) and it fits my bike rack perfectly.

Had some issues pairing it. I had to make my phone forget all other devices before it would detect the bottle, but now it pairs automatically any time I turn it on.

I live in a very rainy area and can't find any info on the speaker's water resistance, but for $20 it won't be a crisis if I had to buy another.

I don't have any trouble hydrating so the reminder light and dancing lights are a non-issue for me, in fact I carry a 32 oz bottle daily already so it'll be an adjustment to lose that extra volume but the speaker is nice enough to warrant the loss.

I don't like the cap compared to my other bottle. It doesn't flip all the way open on its own and feels very cheap. There's also no strap, which my other bottle has, which means I lose a free hand while carrying it.

Definitely a good buy despite shortcomings.

reviews.reviewTitle: This bottle is literally a hooking up device, and much more three thing.
reviews.reviewText:
It is the best water bottle in the whole world. I was hooked up with it the moment I opened the box. I love the bass feature of the bottle. When I put the bottle on my glass table, the whole table was vibrating, and I was like this is so cool. It felt like I was in a concert or a pub with this, rocking the table. With every beat, I can feel the rythim of the song. This is better than Bose headphones tbh. I was so hooked up in the bottle that I get to notice the lid machanism. How it work is really a genius. It is literally cool. Who knew a plastic that looks like a cut straw which same material as the the rubber that acts as a washer of the bottle could be used as a spring for the cap.
But now for the thing that I really want on the bottle as a bonus is a tattoo like design engraved on the transparent body of the bottle, not much design but little bit here and there. It could be a star or moon or clouds or fire. It will definitely complement the dancing lights feature. Thinking about it makes me really excited. I am definitely looking forward to seeing designs on the bottle. It will look Soo cool than the cool thing it is right now.
Another thing I want to see is that a ceiling display thing.
I am so hooked up on this haha. I literally love the ceiling light display that I found. It is literally a plus. It can be used as a disco thing if it has a separate cap that acts as projector for the light. The disco thing could be a major thing when I am going to sleep. Anyway this is just an idea that I really want it to come to life. ;)

This product is just high priced plastic. It comes with instructions that are so confusing that you can't make much sense of them. The only thing I could get this bottle to do was make a random beep once in a while and twinkle colored lights once when I pressed start. The instructions say that you can get the bottle to act as a wireless music amplifier by going to your phone under devices and making a connection to " waterbottle". Of course , that device is not on one's phone, you have to go to your app source. There ARE apps for waterbottles , but not for this waterbottle. The seller also wants you to send them your review and they will send you a second waterbottle as a gift. Good luck on that !

Never thought I would see a day where a Bluetooth speaker tied to a plastic water battle but here we are. I love it! It's a water bottle with a speaker! Also led lights emitting from it to remind u every hour to drink water and stay hydrated. Not only that but led lights can be used to pair up with the music ur playing! Pretty awesome from a small speaker. The music sounds nice and clear, nothing exaggerated but once u put it in a wooden surface , the bass is great coming from a small speaker like this. My only concern would be every time I wash it u may want to take off the bottom speaker portion off, it is water resistant but I wouldn't take that risk. Other the that this is something I am definitely going to have with me every where I go.

I purchased this bottle because I was tired of wasting plastic with single use bottles of water. The water reminder sounded like a good idea, and the speaker would be a bonus. Let me say, that this is way nicer than I was expecting.

First, the bottle itself: It comes apart into 3 pieces, the cap, the bottle, and the speaker. The bottle is easy to clean and maintain, and everything screws back together easily. It holds plenty of water, and does exactly what a bottle should do.

Second, the lights: The lights are bright, and remind you when it is time for more water. There is even a sound reactive mode for a neat little light show on your desk or wherever.

Third, the speaker: This was the biggest surprise. I will admit, I wasn't expecting much from this speaker, but I was blown away. It gets loud, but also clear. If you have it sitting on a wooden surface, it also produces rich, deep bass tones. It is punchy, sounds quite a bit better than my echo dot, and the battery seems to last a very long time. (I haven't timed it, but I haven't had to charge it every day.)

I am highly satisfied with this bottle and would definitely purchase again.

I was so excited about this water bottle! A friend at work got one and I literally placed an order as soon as she showed me. However, when it arrived I realized the hourly reminder DOES NOT WORK AT ALL!
The lights will turn on if you press the power button only but not by itself, which is whats it was supposed to do! On top of that, the pause/play button came broken and I can only control the speaker on my phone... btw, speaker works just fine but it wasn't the reason why I bought the bottle!

I am sad to say I do not recommend this product and will return mine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Finally, a reminder to hydrate that works.
reviews.reviewText: I can not even begin to count how many mobile apps I've downloaded and tried to serve as reminders for me to drink enough water. Every time I get into "one", it is only a matter of time before I begin swiping off the notifications, out of habit and forgo the drinking water part altogether, as I'm supposed to do. With this water bottle though, the notification comes from the sources itself. Now that it is the bottle that glows and makes sounds, it gets my attention and I've been grabbing it, drinking it and then setting it back down until the next reminder comes on. I love it!

If you want a water bottle that reminds you to drink water, I would just recommend getting the Hidrate bottles even though they are a little bit more expensive. This one is good if you will have your water bottle right next to you and you can see the light changing but I usually am on the go and have my water bottle packed away in my bag so the light really doesn't do much for me. Having the Hidrate bottle was so much more effective sense it sends reminders to my phone and tracks my water intake on their app. If you are serious about increasing your water intake, I wouldn't bother purchasing this.

I purchased this dancing water bottle for my 80-year-old Mom. She has a difficult time remembering to drink and I was hoping this cup would remind her every hour to take a drink. The problem is the dancing lights only remain one for less than 2 minutes and if you aren't looking directly at the cup you will miss the "dancing" lights. It took me most of the first day before I saw the lights change colors. The set up was very easy, and the speaker that is in the cup's base works great, but the lights aren't bright enough to catch your attention. And they need to last a lot longer than a minute to be motivated by them. I'm disappointed that the cup won't work for mom but I'll keep it for a Christmas gift,

It's a great bottle if you're not a water drinker and struggling to remember to drink it. It really did it's job for me. I'm giving 3 stars, because after using it for few weeks, it started to leak every time I drink. I need to open the cap and dry it off, before I attempt to drink from it. Otherwise, my shirts would always be wet. I hope it's just a manufacturing issue with this bottle. I will attempt to exchange to a new. But if the same issue will be with another bottle, I will have to return it for good.
UPDATE: I received a replacement and to my biggest disappointment - it's the same issue. Except, that this started to leak from the day 1 and way more than the other one (to the extend where I had to change my top, because it got so wet). It's upsetting, because the lighting worked well reminding to drink.

Cheap water bottle. Save your money their r better water bottles on the market. They offered me a stainless steel water bottle as a gift if I will give them a 5 star review. I can‚Äôt be bought.
Doesn‚Äôt work as advertised.

I‚Äôm terrible at drinking water. I‚Äôm one of those people that are just never thirsty. I can go most of the day without drinking. I know this isn‚Äôt healthy, so I decided to look for a bottle that reminds me to drink.
There are some more expensive ones out there, but I decided to try this one. I‚Äôm pretty happy with it.
It does a nice job of reminding me to drink at least once an hour. For me, that‚Äôs VERY frequent.
PROS:
Lights work well.
Speaker is decent for its size.

CONS:
First time pairing with my phone took a bit. I finally had to forget the device, then try again from scratch. After that, it paired, and then pairs each time automatically.
The bottle is a bit small. Works well for me, but those that actually drink a lot will be refilling frequently.

The water bottle is really cool. I never thought I would need a water bottle to remind me to drink water, but it really works. I get so caught up when I am working, that sometimes I do forget to drink water, so it's good that this water bottle reminds me to stay hydrated. I was amazed that the speaker is so loud, not only is it loud, but you can skip tracks which is really great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Maybe the most frivilous thing I've purchased, but I'm happy with it.
reviews.reviewText: I did not need a water bottle with a glowing LED light and a bluetooth speaker. I don't believe there are many people, if any, in the world who do. That's a problem with me, not the product. If you're looking at this, I don't know what to tell you. It does what it says on the box. If that appeals to you, you should buy it. I definitely remember to drink more water, I guess, and the sound is pretty good for a bluetooth speaker on the bottom of a water bottle. I don't pay enough attention to know if it lights up every hour to remind me to drink, but the light is pretty reflected through the water.

First, I didn‚Äôt give five stars because getting the reminder light to work is a bust. Lol I have no idea how, and I‚Äôve tried all settings and reading the questions on here but nothing. So...that‚Äôs going nowhere. I feel like the instructions could be far more clear on this. Also, colors in the pictures aren‚Äôt clear enough. The pink looks more rose gold in the pics but in reality it‚Äôs baby pink.

Over all, though, it‚Äôs an awesome bottle. The lights are beautiful and you can make them move to the beat of the music. The speaker is clear and loud! And charging is very easy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Broke after 2 months!!! Bluetooth doesn‚Äôt stay connected
reviews.reviewText: Update... two months and my bottle broke!!! The latch won‚Äôt stay closed and the top will not stay tight. So every time you drink water you get drenched! First off I‚Äôll say the water bottle is great! The lights. are great. I‚Äôm not sure how the lights are suppose to display. I feel my bottle is a little bipolar. One day it goes off every two hours next day it‚Äôs every hour ü§î Either way I stay hydrated. Speaker sound is great however a lot of Bluetooth connection issues. Again, not always but some days the speaker plays for hours and hours until it dies. Other days like today, fully charged speaker is disconnecting every 2-3 minutes. Very frustrating. Not worth the $20

reviews.reviewTitle: Not only a great water bottle but fun too!!
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is so much more than what we thought. I bought it for my teenage daughter to encourage drinking more water... not only is the glowing light a great reminder but having the speaker in the water bottle has her carrying it everywhere she goes. We‚Äôve already shred this with all our family members who can‚Äôt wait to buy one too. The bottle doesn‚Äôt leak and is easy to wash, and the handle makes it easy to carry wherever you go. A+++!!

I have a bad habit of not drinking enough water even when the dang water bottle is in my face, the reminder lights are really neat and kinda kick starts my brain to finally register that I should indeed drink out of this bottle now lol. The speaker is surprisingly loud and clear when you play music, I expected a low-quality speaker but that's not the case. I noticed that the silicon part of the top can pop out if you want to clean it but make sure to push it back in where the nub doesn't completely pop out of the other side, otherwise it won't create the watertight seal to prevent the water from spilling out when you tip the bottle over.

But this to help me keep track of my water intake. I don't use it much for that but I do love the speaker. I keep it on my desk and play it all the time the quality is awesome. I would have loved if the light made a continuous blank until you took a drink. It was kind of hard because it only went off once an hour and if I wasn't looking at the bottle I didn't realize it.
The 1st day the reminder glow worked. 2nd day the reminder glow stopped working. I will be returning

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect water bottle for camping, outdoor fun
reviews.reviewText:
This is probably the coolest water bottle I've ever bought, and I've bought a lot of water bottles. This is the perfect bottle to take camping - it can play music through Bluetooth, goes with you if you're out having a picnic or chilling by the campfire, and of course keeps you hydrated. It can actually get pretty loud, too, without sacrificing sound quality! (Note: we didn't let it get too loud while camping because we're not jerks).

The only negative is the bottom (Bluetooth/speaker) is impossible to remove, so I can't actually put it in the dishwasher and I have to be very careful when washing it by hand. That's a bummer.

It's a very basic plastic bottle with a speaker. The 'light' reminder is so light you can barely see it. It feels pretty inexpensively made. The best part of the bottle is the speaker, but it takes up a lot of space I'd rather have for water. It looks way better on the website then it actually is.

OMG! BEST THING I BOUGHT ON HERE. This little gadget is LOUD! I bought this coz I'm an outdoor person. I love fishing, camping, paddle boarding. I thought this would be convenient. I've taken it on deep sea fishing, lake fishing, at work. And today, I finally got the chance to take it out paddle boarding. In the middle of the lake, people would look my way to see where the music is coming from. They were probably 30 to 50 ft away from me. I was definitely the party paddle boarder out there.

I was really curious about this water bottle after a friend of mine had posted it on social media. I went ahead and bought one and I'm in love! How cool is this thing?? Not only does it remind you to drink water, but the bluetooth speaker on it has great sound! I blast my music during my workouts and can easily change the songs and volume. It charges super quick and lasts for hours. It has a double safety lock so no leaking and it's very easy to clean. Definitely worth the buy!

I really love this water bottle! For the money, you can't beat it. I've only had it for almost a week so I can't really review the durability honestly. I will update later on to comment on the durability!
The speaker is great. Louder than my $40 Bluetooth speaker from Walmart. I was really impressed. Easy to use. Very simple instructions and functions.
It lights up as soon as you turn it on and then every hour on the dot after that to remind you to drink! Works just like advertised and it has definitely helped me drink more water these last few days so I'd say it's working!
Overall, I love this product. I left 4 stars for now, because I have no idea what the durability is like. We'll see how it holds up to my hectic life and I will update my review later on, but so far, definitely worth the money!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great icebreaker for middle school students
reviews.reviewText: I purchase this bottle as a gift for my grandson, and he was hand-over-heels about the bottle. He took it with him to school and at recess, played some music and let the bottle "glow." This was the icebreaker he needed since he was in a new school. He said "his peers liked that it lit up as a remainder to drink more water." Thanks for making my grand son's transition to a new school smooth.

This is such a good product. I mainly wanted the music for my desk at work. The top /spout is important to me personally, it is a covered spout with a great seal for toting to and fro. The speaker is not Bose sound ... but that is not what I expected or needed. It is perfect for my needs. The light feature is a crazy cool bonus. I drink water daily... it helps me to keep a portion of my needs/wants in one place. Very easy to separate speaker for washing in dishwasher.
Just a bonus bonus product !

Bought this as a gift for my mom. Needless to say, everyone who sees it is highly impressed with it. She enjoys the reminders to drink more water and it‚Äôs an added bonus for her because she works with children and the kids love the different colored lights. The speaker attached to the bottom is also really nice quality and better than anything I would expect from a water bottle speaker. Overall this thing has great value.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good bottle with speaker but few things can be improved to make it perfect
reviews.reviewText:
I ordered this bottle because I want reminder to drink water. I often forget to drink while working.
Pro -
The speaker is very good. Light glows every hour.
Easy to maintain, clean as the bottle can we removed.
Cons - Only light glows for couple of seconds for reminder. If you are not looking at the bottle, you might miss the it.
Bluetooth connect with any device without any pairing mode. If you are in office and not connected the speaker to your device, anyone else can connect to your speaker and play anything making thinks embarrassing for you.
Suggestion for next model:
Add a pairing mode, so a device can connect to your speaker only when Bluetooth is in pairing/discoverable mode.
Add a sound option for hourly alert or keep the glow light alert 'ON' till some one manually turns then off after drinking water.

I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. It is fun and easy to use too! The lights are bright enough unless placed in a sunlight backdrop. The lights are helpful for her to keep pace with staying hydrated. It could be a larger size but then it wouldn‚Äôt fit on her bike. She can stay hydrated and when not drinking it doubles as a speaker on her bike ride. A suggestion would be to have the buttons be a different color than the base itself. Great idea and satisfied with the product. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value for low cost. Easy to open while driving. Speaker and colors rock!!
reviews.reviewText:
Love this bottle for the great price and fun of it!!! I've dropped it a few times. It's on the verge of breaking soon if I'm not careful lol. One button doesn't work anymore because of my clumsiness.
The speaker is removable from bottom. So water bottle doesn't hold as much water as I'm used to. And when I use speaker while disconnected from the rest of bottle it subtly, slowly moves across surface of table LOL. It eventually falls off my table if I forget to put some cloth under it. The little vibrations of music make the speaker shimmy slowly! It's funny.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as sturdy as I thought it would be.
reviews.reviewText: The plastic part of this water bottle is very thin. The ‚Äúlight‚Äù to remind you to drink is on almost all the time. The Bluetooth speaker is it‚Äôs one redeeming feature. Great sound from it, I used it to listen to a podcast in my car and the sound was great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent Sound Quality, Nice Lights, and functional!
reviews.reviewText: I‚Äôve been looking for a medium sized water bottle that will be easy to carry, and this one does just that! The speaker and lights is an added bonus, and if you put the speaker on a wooden table, it actually delivers more bass which is really cool. It‚Äôs very ergonomic and functional. I‚Äôd totally recommend this to anyone who‚Äôs looking for a nice water bottle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Must buy! Light changing effect is so cool!!
reviews.reviewText: I'm so loving this water bottle. The speaker connects easily to my phone and sounds great. I get so many comments on it. The color changing is bright and very very cool. Charge lasts over 12+ hours with the lights on. I use daily. Super easy to clean. Now everyone in my family want one! I will be purchasing more for friends and family.

Ok so I waited 2 days to write a review and that‚Äôs all it took for me to love love love this water bottle. Not only do I love the reminder to drink but I also fell in love with the fact that it is a Bluetooth speaker as well. Took it for a walk and people was amazed. I also was able to listen to music while cleaning my room without plugging in my old school stereo, which is also a plus in my book because I was always skeptical of portable Bluetooth speakers for some odd reason.

So far, it has alerted me once to drink water. Maybe I am not using it correctly?? the Bluetooth speaker works great and has great sound. The lid locks down when flipped over so it doesn't come back and hit your face while drinking. I gave it a 4 star for now because I am still figuring out how to use it properly on the alert option.

I love this water bottle! Everybody at work laughed and absolutely loved it! It‚Äôs easy to clean. It‚Äôs easy to pair. The lights are very cute! And fantastic sound for its price! I happily bought another one the same day!

reviews.reviewTitle: Coolest reminder to drink water & best price I could find!
reviews.reviewText:
I use to work at an active place (doggie daycare) so I never had an issue with drinking water but since I have an office job & I sometimes get busy or consumed in paper work, I have noticed I'm forgetting to drink water.
I never thought I would need something to remind me but I absolutely love this water bottle! It's easy to use & I love that you can play music or not play music for the reminder to drink. The lights are awesome too! Actually catches my attention & makes me aware that I have not taken a drink in awhile.
The speaker is amazing! It's actually loud & not that static feedback kind of loud but you can actually hear the music & the bass!
I am one happy customer!
¬†I was blown away when I got this bottle 3 in 1 very well build,strong nothing cheap,and speaker after I paired with my iPhone so loud,I‚Äôll definitely buy again,thank you

reviews.reviewTitle: Great gift- teens and tweens love!!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter absolutely LOVES this bottle, I gave to her as a birthday side gift and loved it better than the others! She is 12 years old- my 16 yr old daughter is begging for one, the sound quality is wonderful! Very loud and the lights are super cool- this water bottle is a hit with my teen daughters and their friends!!

reviews.reviewTitle: DO NOT BUY! Not worth the money
reviews.reviewText:
Everything about this water bottle is a joke. The water leaks from the top when you drink from it, the light rarely works but on top of it all, the blue tooth speaker makes random beeping noise that won't stop.

I was on a two hour flight and out of no where, the blue tooth speaker turned on and began making beeping noise FOR TWO HOURS! I couldn't shut it off because the power button didn't work. I couldn't turn down the volume because the volume button didn't work. Definitely not worth the money. DO NOT BUY

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautifully lit AND has a Speaker!!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my mom for three reasons; to remind her to drink more water, to have a nice little speaker for her home workouts, and the lights are so bright and pretty that she wouldn‚Äôt easily lose it! Well, she absolutely loves it. She takes it with her everywhere and is constantly getting complimented on her pretty water bottle! She said it was easy to figure out how to use the first time and it‚Äôs really fun but also very practical!

I bought a black and a pink one to make it fun to remind my mom and I to drink more water. It truly does! The lights go off and I reflexively take a drink and before you know it, I have refilled it many times. The speaker works great and is useful in my office when on calls or wanting to listen to music. Only down side is that it sweats since it isn't insulated. I carry a small towel to help with that. I like that it is only 22 oz doesnt feel like drinking tons. Also, I like the sip opening and locking. I have attached a carabiner to attach to my bag and it is easy to transport. Great for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: this is one of my favorite amazon purchases ever.
reviews.reviewText: It is super sturdy, the lights are a great way to remind me to drink...and i was surprised that the speaker in it is louder than my amazon echo....also i love the fact that it has a spout to drink from not just some giant wide mouth bottle like so many water bottles are today. When its closed - its closed. I have never had it pop open when it shouldnt.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality! Vibrant colors and excellent sound!
reviews.reviewText: What an exciting item that is helpful (reminding me to hydrate) - blue tooth speaker that I use while following a work out DVD. It sounds like the instructor is in the room with me! It makes working out fun with bright fun lighting. I love this product! I purchased blue and black. A must have!! Does not leak. Great weight and quality.

¬†This water bottle is so cool! I own several Bluetooth speakers and this one definitely does it‚Äôs job, I am very impressed with the sound quality and how loud it can get. The lights are neat, and the lid closes solid so there is no leaking. Love the wide top for ice cubes to easily go in and simple to clean mouth piece (if you are a straw user you could add one but I don‚Äôt use a straw on water bottles I pull them out) overall it‚Äôs a fantastic product and if you are an active or outdoors person and don‚Äôt like earbuds, this bottle is great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product but reviews are not to be trusted here
reviews.reviewText:
Very simple. No app to track consumption. Light go on randomly not sure what the algorithm is for that. The bluetooth speaker is awesome and easy to set up. You can wash in washing machine.

I did not like the fact they give you a note asking for good ratings and offering a free item. Really makes the reviews not honest.

Very good product I love the lid doesn't leek and is durable. I love the lights because I sometimes forget to drink so it‚Äôs a good reminder. I haven‚Äôt had the chance to use the speaker. The only thing I would change is I wish it was bigger but it being the size it is makes it easier to hold, so you can‚Äôt have everything

I bought this specifically for the alert feature and after 3 weeks of trying to get it to work I have given up. The only directions provided are not very descriptive and maybe I am doing something wrong? So this will go on the boat and work as a speaker instead. Onto looking for a new alert water bottle!

I had this bottle for a week only and it‚Äôs already broken. After using the bottle the first time my thought was I pretty much just paid for the speaker and the light effect. The bottle itself isn‚Äôt durable. The top is kind of cheap and although I tried to be extremely careful while closing it it still broke on me. Now I can‚Äôt use it at all.

reviews.reviewTitle: Neat concept, if it would actually work.
reviews.reviewText: Charged this bottle when it arrived. Once charged, we filled ot with water and turned it on. Speaker quality was ok but the notification light to drink water doesn't work at all so keeping this product is a moot point since I bought it for that reason.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not so waterproof light up speaker
reviews.reviewText: The bottle only worked for about an hour. Sweat from the outside ran down the "waterproof" speaker and it stopped playing mid song and never worked again.i was extremely disappointed.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it... lights & music! Win/Win
reviews.reviewText:
I like it a lot. It's so cool how it lights up to the music. Really good sound quality. I am still learning how to use it
My favorite part is how clear the music sounds and blinks light to the music. My only con is the button to close it... it seems confusing at first on how to close it. You gotta press it in to close it and out the metal piece over it to secure it....üôÑ

This water bottle is easy to setup and use. I appreciate the quality sound of the bluetooth speaker and enjoy the lights. I have receive several compliments on the water bottle and have directed several people to Amazon to purchase one. The flashing lights as reminder to drink more water is great. However, I wish they would implement an app that you can visually track your water intake as well.

I wanted a water bottle that reminds me to drink water but I got a bonus because it has an awesome speaker. I was really blown away by the clarity and sound! I love that bottle doesn‚Äôt have a straw and I can drink directly from the bottle. Plus, it is one less part to wash. It glows different colors to remind me the drink, and the light can be set to dance with the music when connected to Bluetooth. My kids love this bottle and I can‚Äôt wait to it with us on our walks to the park. Definitely a useful product that is fun for all. üòä

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality water bottle with simple reminders and good value
reviews.reviewText:
Just wanted a good quality water bottle with some kind of simple reminder to help with my bad habit of not drinking enough water and this delivered! I could do without the Bluetooth speaker altogether but maybe I'll get use out of it when going out hiking

The only thing I don't like about it is how loud the noises are when turning the power on and off. If my only desire is to have the reminder functionality, it's very annoying having the incredibly loud noises coming from the speaker when it's trying to connect/disconnect Bluetooth. An option to silently turn on just the reminder light by pressing the power button once then the normal power on where you hold the button would make this a perfect 5/5

This is a nice sturdy bottle. I love that it lights up because it catches my attention and reminds me to drink. After my cancer treatments I've become very forgetful so this is perfect. I think I'll got one from my grandma too. The sound quality of the speaker is great. I'm surprised they don't delt his for more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gets the job done in an affordable way
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son. It does a great job reminding him to drink. We have not hooked up the wifi yet but he loves the cup. My only complaint is it is NOT spill proof so after a few spills we now only let him use it at school and not take it when we go out just incase it tips over.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Reminder to Drink your water
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a water bottle that reminds you to drink, this is the one. I knew I needed to drink much more water during the day than I had been drinking. The light changing effects that the bottle produces catches my eye on my desk and reminds me to drink. I went from drinking 16 oz on a good day to about 70 oz each day. Great investment and it has an added blue tooth speaker.

I bought this for my children to help them remember to drink more water. We did not even use the speaker function, but they love how it lights up to remind them to drink. This was affordable and fun alternative to the 40$ bottles that are on the market. The bottle came with a usb charger and it held a charge for several days. My son accidentally left the water bottle in very cold conditions overnight the first day we had it and it did not damage or affect the device in any way.

reviews.reviewTitle: Broke after 1 washing and not bright
reviews.reviewText: The front push in tab that sits below the metal clasp fell out after 1 hand washing. I pushed it back in but 2 seconds later it snaps back out. And the light is not very bright at all. Junk.

reviews.reviewTitle: Keeps my attention on drinking water
reviews.reviewText:
It holds 22 ozs, so its a doable amount for me to drink in a few hours. The sound through the speaker sounds clear. I probably won't listen to music from it often because it may drain my phone. I love the colored lights blinking in sync with the music. The directions are minimal, so I am still trying to figure out how to get the bottle to remind me to drink.

What I dislike is that the pink light buzzes some. Maybe that is just my bottle. The other two colors are quiet.

This is awesome I love it the bluetooth speaker actually sounds really good and it lights up every hour to remind you to drink you do need to have it but you to see the lights but for me I forget so much to drink even with water sitting next to me so this is perfect.
The speaker comes off so you can wash the bottle

reviews.reviewTitle: Sleek practical designed bottle that truly does bring joy!
reviews.reviewText: I love it! The designers for this product thought of everything! The design is very practical and sleek. When the water bottle lights up it gets me excited to stay hydrated. The leak lock works great. It came with clearly labeled instructions on how to operate all the buttons. I had no idea this came with a speaker when I ordered it and I was pleasantly surprised by how loud it was. The only thing I would say could be added is for the circular grab area to be able to latch as if it were a keychain for those of us who would like to hook it onto our backpacks when going hiking :) this water bottle truly does bring me joy, thank you!
Kind of hard to figure out and I'm not sure if it actually lights up every hour..however our son who is 12 with leukemia and has to drink all day long he loved the colors and the speaker works great.

I‚Äôm in love with this bottle! Concept is genius. Super affordable. I get migraines & constantly hear how I‚Äôm dehydrated. Now I sit in front of my monitor screens all day & watch the bottle change colors to remind me to drink water. Not to mention the great audio sound that comes thru the speaker!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent product and at great price
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is excellent. Bluetooth connectivity is great. The speaker sound is very good. The battery life is excellent. It reminds you to drink water if you have not done it for a while. I do really love this water bottle and the best thing is the price.

I love my water bottle! I recently had bariatric surgery so I have to make sure I consume enough fluids every day and this water bottle helps me so much. I drink about 3 full bottles a day plus when I'm working out or walking, I get to listen to my music which is super clear! I highly recommend this product!!!!

I love this water bottle. I really was looking for something to fit into the cup holders of my new car seat and this is the perfect size and not too bulky. The Bluetooth speaker was an added bonus!! The speaker quality is excellent. I love how the bottle lights up to remind me to drink. I will definitely be recommending this as a gift idea to my friends and family.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Frequent Reminder to Stay Hydrated and a Dance Party All in One!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love the design and layout of this product! First of all the light display to remind me to drink water every hour is fantastic! I also love the Bluetooth speaker at the bottom! The sound quality is fantastic and crisp! Super easy to connect and play music right away! It also detaches from the bottom so you can easily wash the bottle out! I also love the fact that there is an extra lock on the bottle to make sure it doesn‚Äôt accidentally open and spill all over if you are traveling or riding a bike! And lastly the price is fantastic! Don‚Äôt think you are gonna find a better water bottle than this! Highly recommend!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works for what i need but it arrived broken.
reviews.reviewText: Just got it today and charged up the speaker, it connected just fine to my devices and is pretty loud, louder than I needed which is great, I think its going to work out nicely. The one issue I have though is it arrived broken. The speaker button to lower volume does not work. The pause and raise volume have a click while the lower does not, it doesn't really hinder my experience much so im not going to bother returning it, but its worth mentioning. I may take it apart later and see if I can mend it but the rubber surrounding the speaker is glued in two places.

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than other Smart Water Bottles!
reviews.reviewText: This smart water bottle goes above and beyond other bottles I was contemplating spending more money on. I wanted to wait until I had been able to use the bottle several weeks before reviewing it just to see if it was going to mess up or break. It still works just as it did the day I took it out of the box. I love the glow it gives and the bluetooth speaker has really come in handy in our office. I liked mine so much I had to buy another one to have it shipped to my sister in Hawaii. She was impressed by the speed of receiving it! She is still using her's also.

Pro:
1. low price
2. speaker
Con:
1. cap leaks
2. heavier because of the speaker
3. less water capacity because of the speaker
4. taller because of the speaker, and the small base made it unstable and easy to tip over.

All I wanted is a water bottle with a flashing light reminder to drink. All other bells and whistles are useless and make it worse.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super convenient addition if you can‚Äôt remember to hydrate
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle (so far) is awesome! The speakers seem to be pretty great for such a compact device, and the lights to remind you to drink are super helpful. The best part, for me, is the fact that I can have this bottle play my music in the cup holder of my stroller while my phone/pedometer remains in my pocket without any wires annoying me! Such a cool idea! I hope it keeps working!

I got it yesterday and I'm already loving it! I work as a nurse and sometimes forget to drink water when I get busy. This would really help! Plus the speaker can let me listen to my music to soothe my mind when the workload gets too much. I just wish this bottle comes in more than 22oz since I work 12 hour shifts. But otherwise, this is a great buy!

reviews.reviewTitle: Solves more problems than you think.
reviews.reviewText: Couldn‚Äôt figure out how to effectively get my teenager to drink enough water with her medication. It was really a problem. She opened the box, looked at the bottle, linked it to her Amazon music playlist and ran to her room. Brilliant idea to make her life a little more ‚Äúnormal‚Äù while coping with a chronic illness. So thankful to see her smile. Price is amazing. Don‚Äôt hesitate to buy. üôÇ

reviews.reviewTitle: This bottle does help me drink more during my work shift.
reviews.reviewText: Haven't figured out how to set it to light up exactly on the hour but, that's no biggie. It does light up every hour to remind me to drink. Doesn't keep track of how much I've had but, that's no problem. Works as advertised.

I love the combination of water bottle and Bluetooth speaker. All my friends get a kick out of it and it helps me never leave my water bottle laying around. It's super convenient and produces decent sound for its size. Fun cheap gift too. The price is right for what you get. 100% recommend!

I don‚Äôt like that you have to charge it and it takes a while. Maybe an hour or two. I love the music from my iPhone and the calming apps it plays. I love the lights. I like the buttons. It has a play button and volume buttons.

This is something I never thought I would use but I was so wrong! Highly recommend if you are as forgetful as me about properly hydrating yourself. Also, I removed the speaker from my office and replaced it with this......a great sound that was u expected also.

I am very pleased with this water bottle. It subtlety reminds me to drink every hour by glowing the color of my choice. I like its weight and its composition. It will hold .5 liter and that is easy to track. The feature that I didn't expect to wow me was the bluetooth speaker. I went to yoga class and the instructor was unable to connect to Pandora to play her music for the class. I said my water bottle was bluetooth. She was able to find and connect to the bottle and play the music very easily, saving the day! Now she uses my bottle at each class!

Purchased this for bike rides as it is much safer than wearing headphones. It is the perfect size and fits securely into the bottle holder on the bike. The sound quality is surprisingly good with a nice warmth and clarity...a huge upgrade from the phone speaker and gets much louder than needed. The speaker base easily unscrews from the water bottle for cleaning purposes. Very happy with the purchase at this price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great water bottle more features would be nice
reviews.reviewText: So far so good, it does what it's suppose to as for hydrating my wife uses it more. There is an issue with with it reminding every hour. Would be nice if it was consistent but it works. Also would be nice if the bottle vibrated every hour.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great water bottle! Bought it for biking.
reviews.reviewText:
This bottle is lightweight and has a nice, clear speaker that can get pretty loud. Lights are fun and can be turned on to play to the music or shut off to only come
On for the two hour ‚Äúdrink water‚Äù prompt. It‚Äôll be great to take on bike rides! So happy I found this! Bargain.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don‚Äôt like drinking water? This bottle is for you.
reviews.reviewText: I‚Äôve always had a hard time drinking water, like most people I‚Äôm sure, but this water bottle makes it much easier. It‚Äôs visibility pleasing with the lights that remind you to drink your water and it has a speaker on it so you can listen to your music. My mind was blown and I‚Äôm loving it.

The Bluetooth speaker works well but, the water bottle has a strong smell. I have been using this smart water bottle for more than 2 weeks and have washed it everyday to see if the smell goes away but no! I only use it for water and I wish the smell could go away but it seems that nothing works. Besides that everything works fine

The speakers are FANTASTIC! But the whole water reminder glowing light doesnt work? I dont know if it just doesn't work and the ad was a scam or I dont know how to make it work? But other than that the bottle is good. The speakers are a must!

reviews.reviewTitle: My son took the first one I ordered, so I had to purchase a new one
reviews.reviewText: This is my second smart water bottle. I always get ask about while using it. Several of my walking friends have purchased one. I like the speaker, reminder to stay hydrated and style of my smart water.

¬†I love the flashing lights & that it‚Äôs bluetooth. I can listen to my tunes from my iPhone.
What I don‚Äôt like is that the ‚Äúvolume up‚Äù button doesn‚Äôt work that well. It makes the music skip. The volume down is just fine.
I can‚Äôt get the bottom off in order to wash the bottle very well & I don‚Äôt want it getting wet & ruining it.

I like to take walks in the evenings with my children and everyone wants to listen to music. I didn‚Äôt want to carry around a speaker and felt like headphones would be unsafe. So when I came across this bottle I thought this would be a total score. We just got back from an afternoon walk and we were all very happy with it. The speaker is loud. I was pleasantly surprised. The lights are just bonus. We carry water bottles as we walk and having the speaker makes it even better. Would definitely purchase more and gift these to my friends who work out. Happy customer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Quality Speaker but Faulty Open/Close latch
reviews.reviewText: I REALLY REALLY wanted to leave a very positive review for this water bottle. I was so excited to get it and talked about how good it was for the price- especially since it's also a speaker. However, after 3 days of use, the latch/spring to open/close the bottle literally just popped out of the socket as I was trying to close the bottle and now it is no longer usable as a water bottle because it doesn't close. This could be a rare occurrence and if it wasn't for this I would have nothing but positive things to say.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great bottle but wish it held more water.
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy this water bottle! My lid does not snap on all that well, but nothing to send back for. I love the functionality of this bottle. I debated between this one and one that was labeled different times of the day. I am satisfied that I chose this one because it has a visual reminder. It is very easy to clean too! The ONLY drawback I would say is the amount of water it holds. I wish this held more water at once than it does. However, I still love this and will continue to use it!!!!

It was cool for the first day. Second day pieces starting falling off. Metal piece that keeps the lid closed fell off. Spring latch fell off. Doesn‚Äôt really glow. Sound was good. I would have sent it back, but threw out the package. Was so excited, but quickly disappointed.
This is a good speaker and a pleasant reminder to stay hydrated. A variety of colors, the blue fits nicely on my desk. Added a clip to make it easier to hook and it works great to take on a hike.
This water bottle is fabulous! It shipped quick, arrived on time and was easy to set up and connect to blue tooth. My daughter also thought it was neat and wants one now. Price is right as well.

This water bottle is great! My medical condition requires I drink water often and this device is perfect with its reminder. It comes with a nice charger cord and the sound is great. The sound/light unit screws onto the bottom- great!
I wish it was just a little larger.
Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice Water Bottle, Wish It Lasted Longer
reviews.reviewText: My son really liked this water bottle. It sounded great, looked really nice, connection was good but he‚Äôs only 10, autistic, dropped it and it broke. The speaker part is still in tact though but it‚Äôs not working so... he‚Äôs a bit tough and I‚Äôm not sure how durable the water bottle is but it seemed to be made well.

Just got this today and I love it already! I could now take my music with me and stay hydrated. The speaker works great and is very loud for its size. The water bottle lights up to remind you hourly to drink your water. The bluetooth set up is always very easy. I would definitely buy this again and would even consider purchasing it as gifts.

reviews.reviewTitle: Piece of junk. Broke 2 days later.
reviews.reviewText: Piece of crap. I should've known better when similar products were selling for significantly more. The bluetooth speaker broke Sunday. I received it Friday. Definitely returning.

This is a super fun way to remind yourself to drink water. Plus the speaker is LOUD!!!!! You can control the volume either on your phone or on the bottle. As for durability I'm not 100% sure. I will not be putting it in the dishwasher that is for sure. The speak is removal so if you wanted to put it in the dishwasher you probably could but I'm thinking it might melt a little.
Over all I think its a fun way to get more water in.

reviews.reviewTitle: Waaaaay better than other similar water bottles!
reviews.reviewText: OMG! I love it! I almost paid $55 for a similar cup my boss got with half the features and horrible reviews! I am SO happy I went with my gut and information from previous reviews! As much as I spend on other water bottles this one is way better! Decent sound from a small speaker and definitely helps my water intake! Definitely a recommended products! Thanks guys!

I am a bit of a gadget junky, so no surprise this caught my eye! I was, however, incredibly pleased after it arrived to find it was not just fun but incredibly functional. The speaker quality is excellent, removing the bottle for cleaning is very easy, and I was surprised to find I really did benefit from the ‚Äúreminder‚Äù to drink water. And how did I overlook the dancing lights! If you are looking at this, you should go for it.

This water bottle is amazing! It looks great and feels very durable! I love the reminder, it has kept me on track, which was the main reason I purchased it. The lights are bright and the speaker is wonderful! It gets louder than I thought it would. Would definitely recommend!

Received my bottle today and I like it. I wish it had the marking on the side so that I could keep up with how much I'm drinking, but it is still a great bottle. It is actually loud for it to be so small. You can use the water bottle to skip to the next song or even repeat the current song. Just remember that the power button needs to be on to remind you to drink water. I hope you enjoy your bottle as much as I have so far.
Great product!!!! I love the fact that its has a speaker which plays loud. The different colors are amazing. I actually brought it into work and everyone was amazed and purchased several.

This thing turns heads...so many ppl ask me where did I get it and what it does...the blinking lights when it's time to drink is perfect to help me stay on track with drinking water...BUT...the bluetooth speaker was a bonus...the speaker is great quality to be a water bottle ...great for walks or just chilling in the back yard...

reviews.reviewTitle: Lots of fun and connects quickly

Since my laptop was on when the bottle arrived, I charged the bottle through my computer. The cable included is universal. Charging time, about an hour and a half, I expect the time is faster charging from a strip or wall outlet. Bluetooth pairing is easy, but it doesn‚Äôt share with other devices. I could not use the sound bar and bottle speaker together.

So I paired with my android phone. If you like loud, this speaker can get loud. I haven‚Äôt experienced the increase in bass when placed on wood surfaces. Amazing range, I carried my phone upstairs, closing doors behind me, walked through all the rooms before returning downstairs and re-entering the kitchen where I left the bottle. The signal never dropped.

The lights change colors or can be set on a single color. Two or three of these bottles set on red and green would make a nice holiday decoration. It goes without saying, this is a neat gift, Christmas or any time of the year.

The power base screws free from the bottle and functions on its own. The bottle is plastic, flip top

I forgot to turn the power off before going to bed and the battery was not dead when I woke this morning. So, you‚Äôre getting at least twenty-four hours on a single charge.

reviews.reviewTitle: What is the point of this?
reviews.reviewText:
I liked the idea of the light prompting me to drink water, but it‚Äôs just not working.
The lights stay on for maybe an hour, then they go off. I couldn't figure out how to get it to light up to ‚Äòremind‚Äô me to drink‚Ä¶ the light changes color, but it‚Äôs not very visible. Is it supposed to remind me merely by changing color? No idea.

It makes an annoying ding every time you turn the light on, because it‚Äôs turning the speaker on. Why do I need to run sound through‚Ä¶ my water bottle? Kinda perplexing. On a picnic maybe. Or if you are one of those people who plays music out loud as you hike/run.
When it's low on battery (which happens too quickly), it says loudly ‚Äòlow battery‚Äô which is just unnecessary.

The lid is cheap and already cracking. I do like that it has a metal piece to hold it on so it won‚Äôt open accidentally.

It‚Äôs ok as a weird novelty gift I guess.

---- Update a few days later ----
I received an email and a text message from the seller of this, bribing me to remove/amend my review. For 1, they are NOT supposed to contact me like that (esp. using my phone number), and for 2 obviously it's wrong to influence my review in that way. I reported them to Amazon.

reviews.reviewTitle: In case I forget I‚Äôm thirsty‚Ä¶.
reviews.reviewText:
This bottle will remind me!

I‚Äôve gotta say, how do you make an inherently mundane object like a bottle something people will want to buy? Load it with cool gimmicks!

This bottle is really pretty cool. It will light up periodically to ‚Äúremind‚Äù you to hydrate. You can connect it via Bluetooth to your music source, and it really puts out nice sound in both quality and volume. It‚Äôs well-designed, and good quality.

The only problem we had was that the twist-cap was extremely tight when we fiorst got it and had trouble getting it off. But once we loosened it up, all was well from that point on.

If you‚Äôre going to be taking some water (or other liquid) around with you, why not take some entertainment at the same time?

I never thought that I would own a water bottle that tells me to drink and plays songs from my phone. But.. here it is. The ICEWATER 3-1 Smart bottle does just that.
It is easy to set up the bluetooth and it charges in a reasonable time. The speaker sounds good and can be played quite loud.
As a water bottle, it does not leak and is easy to open. It has a metal wire clip to keep it closed. I have only one concern with the bottle and that is dropping it. It has a heavier bottom with a rubber pad so it will likely bounce if it falls in that direction. If it hits on the lid...I had a similar bottle with a plastic lid catch that broke the first time that I dropped it. I don't intend on testing this bottle by dropping it and I must emphasize that this is a concern not something that happened with this bottle.
The bottle itself seems to be tough and well designed to hold in your hand or place on a table.

The only complaint I have about this bottle is I could not take it with me on my bike ride. The hard plastic makes it difficult to put in/take out of the bottle cage. I think it is suited more to take in the office, when you could be working away and forget to drink water. However, if this is the main reason to get this bottle, there plenty of other things that remind you of something. My watch tells me to get up every hour, so I'd go and drink water at that time.

This water bottle is cool. Beside a decent bluetooth speaker at the bottom (that could be so convenient for a bike ride), you have changing colors that serve as a reminder. This also an opportunity for you to get up and stretch. The speaker can be detached from the bottle if you don't want to carry the whole thing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Silly but I have no complaints
reviews.reviewText:
This is everything it claims to be, a water bottle with pretty lighting that makes the water glow, with a built in bluetooth speaker that does sound good, with a reminder that you need to drink.

It's also kinda silly, and I'm constantly asked why my water bottle is playing music or talking.

Pairing was extremely easy, as was getting the lighting to work (hold pause and it glows and rotates colors, which is pretty if you're biking at night). Every 90 minutes I got an audible indicator to drink. The sound is loud and clear, and while the range isn't exactly home theater, it sounds a lot better than my phone and is great for music when you're out and about. I noticed battery life isn't amazing. Within three hours it was dead.

As a water bottle, I have no complaints. It didn't leak, it was easy to sip from, and the speaker is well isolated and safe when filling the bottle, which screws onto the speaker part. The plastic is tough, and though it gets little scratches, I've dropped mine hard and it's still working great.

For the money it's got a lot of features. They aren't featured you needed but they work as advertised and I think this is an amusing product.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's a strange product that shows we live in strange times
reviews.reviewText:
My daughter needs to up the amount of water she drinks and the idea of a water bottle that changes colors to remind one to guzzle water seemed an interesting gimmick. It sort of works but like everything else, the changing light becomes part of the background after a day or two. It does not keep ones attention. The speaker actually sounds better than expected but one should have pretty low expectation for a speaker melded into a water bottle, I suppose.

Is it worth the money? Maybe for some folks who do need gimmicks to remind then to tend to their thirst or who want to listen to podcasts at the beach. It's a strange product that shows we live in strange times.

I honestly thought this bottle had some color changing tech built-into the plastic, but no, that isn't it at all. It is not only a bottle, but also a mini bluetooth speaker which operates the colors in order to remind you hourly to drink your water or whatever it may be you are hydrating with.

It's always a good reminder to dink regularly, but an added bonus of a speaker too? Now that is pretty dang cool. The only way this could be better is if the case had been made so that it was more insulated in order to keep the contents cold or hot longer. Honestly, this is the only thing I can see that could be improved upon.

The speaker is not bad, especially considering how small it is. But with that said, it still is a pretty decent speaker. Don't compare it to an expensive JBL or Bose, but for what it is and what it does, I was pleasantly surprised how good it was. Just keep that in mind.

All in all I'm quite thrilled as to how cool this is. I highly recommend it.

If you want an interesting conversation starter, this might be the right water bottle for you! Here‚Äôs what is good about this product:

- Bottle lights up nicely after an hour (from the time you turn it on). You can choose from a variety of preset colors. This serves as an excellent reminder to stay hydrated.
- The bottle seals up nicely without leakage. It also opens up / closes nicely. It includes a lock to prevent the bottle from accidentally opening up inside of a backpack, etc.)
- It‚Äôs easy to clean, which is appreciated.

What needs improvement:

- The speaker does not play Bluetooth music well. I have an iPhone and tried to stream music to it (a couple of feet away); the signal cuts out every few seconds. It reminds me of a cellphone that‚Äôs just about ready to lose its signal. (The iPhone plays fine with other Bluetooth players, in case you‚Äôre curious.)

Overall, it‚Äôs a fun conversation starter and a great way to keep hydrated.

Even though the ICEWATER 3-in-1 Smart Water Bottle seems a bit frivolous, it is delightful to my eight year old grandson, who loves to use it when he visits! It‚Äôs very different, works fine, SAFE, and would make a cool gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stay hydrated and look cool while doing it
reviews.reviewText:
Everyone needs to drink more water, and this cute little water bottle will remind you to drink up. This cute bottle will light up periodically to remind you that it's time to chug some water and rehydrate. If you are gonna carry a water bottle around, get one that can multitask. This is not only a water bottle and healthy reminder system, it also has colored lights and a blue tooth speaker in the base. Seriously, it is such a great thing to have while riding a bike, hanging at the beach, picnic, working in the garage, etc...

It charges via USB with the included cord and you connect to your music via bluetooth. The speaker is surprisingly clear and loud for being little. The top is tight and water is not going to leak out if it falls over or is in a totebag. My friends were oohing and awwing over it, and they all want one now too.

The little metal catch that keeps the lid closed had me baffled at first, so this could all be a matter of user error but I can hardly get it to work. It pairs for music, but I've had problems getting it to connect on the second go after being out of range for a while. The reminder feature went off once after about six hours of sitting on my desk at work idle, and that's about it. The lights are very pretty, but I've had them turn on in the middle of the night twice, and that was annoying. I'm not impressed.

Great water bottle. I was super excited about it and I do feel like it kept me hydrated. My husband charged it up for me and the charge lasted about 24 hours. Be warned though, it talks. My husband and I were in the bedroom and we hear a voice say something in the kitchen. We looked at each other funny and I walked out to see what the deal was. I probably jumped about a foot in the air because just as I walked into the kitchen I hear it again. It took me a second to process that it was the bottle saying in a computerized voice ‚Äúlow battery‚Äù. Just long enough to scare the crap out of me. It didn‚Äôt help that we have been into sci-fi thrillers lately. You think you are a strong independent person that can hold their own and protect your home... up until a water bottle about near gives you a heart attack.

reviews.reviewTitle: An unusual combination, a good priced bicycle water bottle and speaker.

For the price and the functionality, this is easily the smartest water bottle purchase I have ever made. reviews.reviewTitle: The Most Useful Item At Work!
reviews.reviewText:
While searching for a music playing alternative for my job,which doesn‚Äôt allow earbuds anymore,I came across a Bluetooth speaker that is also a Water Bottle. And boy did the ICEWATER Smart Bottle do the trick.

For starters,the actual speaker has some good clarity and low end. Shakes the water inside like that one scene from Jurassic Park when the T-Rex First shows up. Truly sounds high quality went into the speaker itself.

The bottle holds just the right amount of fluids I would need working as a mechanic. You truly can pop this thing open with one hand. But Popping it back on requires some force. No biggie. What I don‚Äôt like is the latch can sometimes not pop off all the way and instead just ‚Äúpops‚Äù. Lid stays on but now it isn‚Äôt locked and you can freely move it back, but that was just one thing I didn‚Äôt like that I had to mention.

The added light effects are bright enough for me during the day to notice and mesmerizing at night. The strobe effects blend well with whatever music is playing. Pretty great. What I would‚Äôve wanted though were more patterns of colors and more colors to choose from. I know that maybe giving us more than just Dance Mode would‚Äôve confused the Hydration Reminder with user presets but maybe different colors,haptic feedback? Probably ways to make the reminder stand out a little more than it does here.

Other than that I can‚Äôt much complain. It more than delivers on what it says and I am completely satisfied with this product as a mechanic looking for music without getting into trouble and giving it more useful purpose to me than just play music. No part of the bottle offering is sacrificed in quality.
Quick shipping. Exactly as described. Quick customer service response to questions. Works great!
